data.text: @emmabaker10 Hola Emma, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of the claim opened at found spot? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@ShivOneAndOnly Hola Shiv, we are sorry for the inconvenience, could you please give us by DM your claim case number to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@CCarson09784955 Hola Carson, we're sorry you have this impression of us. We would like to know if you have finally been able to carry out the corresponding claim, we remain attentive to your comments. Regards.
@Cris_ast85 Hello, Cristina. We apologize for the inconveniences. We have requested some information from you, through the DM you sent us. Kind regards.
@sscarllet Hola Kathryn. Sorry for the inconvenience. Could you send us a DM with your IBPlus number, full name and email address? https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@DrJanetWilson1 Hola Janet, we're sorry to read this. Could you please clarify if both flights were under the same booking? Please send us a DM with your booking details and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@fedork77 Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your claim reference number, full name and email address, so we can check its status https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@paulpottsmusic Hola Paul, we're glad to read this and remain at your disposal. Best regards

@elianabenevento Hola Eliana. Sorry for the inconvenience. Did you open a PIR (property irregularity report) with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary? Please send us a DM with the PIR reference and your full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@RickRodenburg1 Hola Rick, we've just replied your DMs. Best regards
@SakshiBhansal10 You're welcome, Sakshi. Unfortunately, we really need the PIR reference number in order to assist you. Best regards
@russrobert Hola Russ, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...), along with more details about your query https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@joel_tse Hola Joel, please send us a DM with your full name, booking code and ticket number (075...) https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Jessica14228579 We've replied her FB messages and we'll continue the conversation only with Maria, since she is the passenger. Best regards
@Jessica14228579 Please tell us what's her name on Facebook, so we can locate her messages. You can send it via DM, in case you prefer https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

data.text: @jensclar Hola Jennifer. Sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@SakshiBhansal10 In this case, you need to open a PIR (property irregularity report) with the airline that operated the last flight in your itinerary. Did you open the PIR at the airport and received a reference number? Please send us a DM with the PIR reference https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@ManiacMcCormill Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Our colleagues sent a new message to Marrakech's airport asking about your bag. We've replied your DMs
@ArtySausage We've sent you a new DM. Please check

@SakshiBhansal10 Sorry to read this. If you forgot the bag at the airport, you should contact the airport's lost and found. If the checked bag went missing after flying with us and it never reached the luggage belt for you to collect it, you actually need to open a /1

urls.title: ¿Para qué sirve y cómo se crea el wayfinding en los aeropuertos?
urls.description: ¿Conoces el concepto wayfinding? El wayfinding en los aeropuertos es un pilar básico para movernos por él. Te contamos en qué consiste.

data.text: We tell you more about how we are using wayfinding in our hub (6/6) 👉 https://t.co/Xlim7i9PNA
Did you know that at T4 and T4s passengers can use colours to help them find their way? From red (south) to north (blue) (5/6)
The wayfinding we use in our hub is designed to be: (4/ 6)
What disciplines are represented in wayfinding? (3/ 6)
It's an information system that helps you to find your way around spaces like airports (2/ 6)
Know what wayfinding is? Follow the thread (1/6) https://t.co/BTAqHgSYxr
@andre_cuesta Hola, ¿no has recibido respuesta a la reclamación o no estás conforme? ¿nos aclaras en tu mensaje privado para poder ayudarte? Gracias. Un saludo
@MissMaplestone Hola Vanya, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your situation to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@SakshiBhansal10 Hola Sakshi, if you lost your baggage at the plane or airport you can fill out the lost and found website through this link: https://t.co/xss7ipPdy2 . Regards
@ArtySausage Hola Jude, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards

@pdh194 HOla Piers, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@sarahlaclau Hola Sarah, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details of your baggage claim, including your PIR code, full passenger name and registered email? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@PrincessDuggan Hola, lamentamos leer lo que comentas ¿Podrías indicarnos a través de un MD todos detalles de tu situación y si abriste una reclamación en el aeropuerto? Gracias de antemano https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Steve22944567 Hola Steve, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards

urls.title: Travel restrictions due to COVID-19
urls.description: Check the regulations, requirements and restrictions for travel established by the different countries. Plan your flight ensuring that you meet all the requirements to make your international trip.

data.text: @coco07751613 Hola Maxwell, restrictions such as obligatory mask use on board are stablished by the corresponding health authorities and these must be followed by every airline. For more details, please visit our website https://t.co/tAXgHHuDbg . Best regards.
@abaral12 Hola, we've sent you another DM with more details on your case. Kind regards.
@ManiacMcCormill Hola, we've sent you a DM, please check our message. Kind regards.
@abaral12 We have replied to your DMs, kind regards.
@abaral12 Hola, please send us a DM with your ticket numbers so we can have a look at the status of your request. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Salik1601 Hola, we will consult this internally and contact you back, as soon as we have details. Regards
@KirbyBurke Hola Kirby, we have replied to your DMs. Best regards.
@E_l_y_s_e_ Hola Elyse, apologies for the late reply, we've just responded to your DMs. Best regards.
@Semyaj Hola Jayme, we're very sorry to read this. If you have it, please send us a DM with your claim number so we can have a look at it's current status. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@wagsandruffs Hola Jen, we're very sorry to read this. Were you able to issue a claim directly at the airport counters? Please send us a DM with the details so we can have a look. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Gissella_irie Hemos contestado a tu mensaje directo, Gissella. Saludos.
@susanwagland Hola Susan, We have answered your private message. Regards.
@Owentracy38 Hola, please send us via MD more details of your case and the PIR code generated with your report so that we can verify the information from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@SusanRFajardo Estamos al tanto de tu caso, Susan. En cuanto haya detalles, te informamos. Agradecemos tu paciencia. Saludos.
@thisdoesntwork1 Hello, we're sorry to read what you tell us. Please send us more details through a DM so we can verify more information from here. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@AnnaKohn1 Hola Anna. Have you opened an irregularity (PIR) at the airport? Please send us more details along with your full name in a DM so we can check the information available from here. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@sanfran1975 Hola, Francisco. Sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@VickyShivandu Hola Victoria, we've just replied your DMs. Best regards
@cr12356789 Hola, we've just replied your DMs. Unfortunately, the claim still hasn't been processed. We appreciate your patience
@arshakyan_david We've just replied your DMs. Please check
@maedelellis Hola Mae, we've just replied your DMs. Best regards
@arshakyan_david Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, email address and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@arshakyan_david Unfortunately, we really need an actual positive test result signed and stamped. A doctor's note isn't enough. Sorry
@arshakyan_david A doctor's letter isn't enough to prove that you had covid before the flight. We need an actual PCR or antigen test stamped and signed by the person responsible for carrying it out.
@AliceKhalafyan full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@AliceKhalafyan Hola, we're sorry to read this and would like to offer our condolences. We offer a voucher or a flight change when a passenger tests positive for covid-19 within the last 7 days before the departure. Please send us a DM with your booking code, /1

urls.title: Measures to let you change your travel plans
urls.description: At this difficult time we are offering complete flexibility by relaxing the change and refund conditions for all fares and flights until 30 June this year. So you can plan your trip later on

data.text: @arshakyan_david Hola Shak, we're sorry to read this. When a passenger tests positive for covid-19 within the last 7 days before the departure, we offer a voucher or a flight change. More details at https://t.co/mPXQcMsCw9 . Please send us a DM with your booking /1

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @shmandz Hola, Shmand. Sorry for the inconvenience. In case you wish to file a formal complaint, please access: https://t.co/pVVvyg1YzT . If an 'error message' pops up, you just need to keep clicking on 'continue'. Regards
@ringmyDORbell_ You're welcome. We remain at your disposal
@ringmyDORbell_ Hola, we're still waiting for an update from the claims department. We can see that a check was sent to you on july 7, so you should receive it shortly. Kind regards
@MahadAliWeydow Hola, how we can help you' could you send us a DM with the details please? https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@MIZ_BIOS Hola Leocadio, nuestros compañeros encargados de equipaje te contactarán en cuanto tengan novedades. Saludos.
@smilearora09 Hola Smile, we sent you a DM. We will check this internally. Regards.
@guypratt Hola Guy, we sent you a DM requesting some information. Thank you.
@TurnJorgeZapata Jorge, dimos respuesta a tu DM desde @iberia solicitando los datos personales asociados al PIR para poder comprobar, los esperamos por esa vía. Gracias
@nomyeongrey We got it, give us a minute to reply to it. Thank you.
@smilearora09 Did you sent the required documents that our colleagues requested you by email the 20-06-2022? Please let us know by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@dingcharlie_ Hola Charlie, we are sorry to hear this, please send us the details of your booking and the report for the luggage by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@smilearora09 Hola Smile, please send us the details of the booking and if you have any file number by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@guypratt Hola Guy, please send us the PIR code, your complete name and your full contact details by DM. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@dztrader2 Hola DZ, could you tell us the specific days that you are looking for by DM? We have a direct flight from Madrid the 8th August. Regards.

@perlalessandra Hola Perla, ¿cómo podemos ayudarte?. Déjanos saber por MD los detalles de la gestión que intentas realizar a través de nuestra web y una captura de pantalla en donde se pueda evidenciar la incidencia para revisar e indicarte cómo proceder. Un saludo.
https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@Karen_wells_bbk Hola Kate please provide us further info about the booking in a DM in order to consult. Regards
@Karen_wells_bbk Hola Karen, you make the purchase of this booking directly with us? Regards
@stevenp2102 Hola Steven, please contact in a Dm to provide further information in order to assist you.  Regards ⇢ https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@EdwinAZFlyer Hola, we do not have a status match campaign at the moment. Regards
@dztrader2 Hola Dz. exactly which route are you searching? since in principle the operative flights will be only the ones our website shows when you make the search. Regards
@stevenp2102 Were you able to contact with our colleagues through Serviberia Steven? If so, what have indicated you on your case? Please let us know. Regards

@LaMaraahr Hola. Nuestros compañeros señalan haber evidenciado una autorización bien sea o para un bono o un cambio por razones derivadas de salud. Por favor, déjanos saber la alternativa que tomarías, o si ya le has tomado. Saludos.

@Gissella_irie Hola LaConsentida,  respondimos a tu mensaje directo. Amablemente te pedimos que mantengas la conversación en ese canal para tener todos los detalles en el mismo chat, gracias. Saludos.
@AdrianaBoufis Hola Adriana, we've just replied your DM. Best regards
